who-we-are.subtitle: Experienced technology consultants making the world a better place

accessible.title: Accessible and flexible
accessible.description: Based in Stuttgart, our agile approach allows us to fit your needs as a business.

experienced.title: Experienced and knowledgeable
experienced.description: We've seen it all, with 15 years of cloud experience in businesses large and small, across a range of industries and countries.

enthusiastic.title: Enthusiastic and dependable
enthusiastic.description: Technology is our passion. Our clients trust us because we care about building the right solution, not just fulfilling a contract.

who-we-are.title: Who we are
who-we-are.description: Whether in cloud, platforms or security, Think Ahead Technologies is your reliable partner from Stuttgart.
who-we-are.subtitle: Experts in cloud, platforms and security, we are ready to rise to your challenges.

values.title: Our values
values.subtitle: It isn't an accident that our approach produces results — our work is built on some powerful core principles.

proactivity.title: Be proactive
proactivity.description: Solving a problem when asked means solving it too late. We're always on the lookout for ways to improve your business.

learning.title: Learn fast
learning.description: Technology is a huge field, and nobody can know everything. Learning, then, is the most important thing - and it's at the core of our approach.

trustworthiness.title: Earn trust
trustworthiness.description: When questions or issues arise, we believe firmly that raising them directly and openly allows for more effective, more enjoyable collaboration.

cheerfulness.title: Light up the day
cheerfulness.description: Solving hard problems is fun! Our infectious enthusiasm makes it a joy to work together, no matter the subject matter.

impact.title: Our impact
impact.subtitle: Our passionate approach can benefit your business in a range of ways.

productivity.title: Boost productivity
productivity.description: Get more done with less. Make the most of your team, your tech and your position in the market.

costs.title: Optimise costs
costs.description: From streamlining deployments to adopting more tailored tools, there are many ways to save money on your infrastructure.

focus.title: Focus on what matters
focus.description: Technology offers limitless possibilities - we can help you prioritise those that actually benefit your business.

adaptation.title: Adapt faster
adaptation.description: Stay ahead of your customers' ever-changing needs by delivering regularly, reliably and rapidly.

unused.old-blurb: A small team of passionate consultants, we leverage our wide range of industry experience to bring you the infrastructure solutions you need to make working with technology a joy, not a chore. We're used to working in large and small organisations, using Agile practices to implement solutions speedily but without compromise.
unused.tagline: Experience collaboration that leads to <0>real results</0> and promotes your <0>sustainable growth</0>.
unused.intro1: We are a small team of <0>passionate technologists</0>, offering tailor-made IT solutions for all industries. Our passion for complex problems makes us perfect for improving the <0>efficiency and security</0> of your business processes.
unused.intro2: We're not just talking about <0>Agile</0>: we live by <0>flexibility and innovation</0>. Through our <0>years of experience</0>, we're familiar with the nuances of technology and the requirements of modern companies in particular.
unused.intro3: Whether you're looking to <0>migrate to the cloud</0>, improve your <0>IT infrastructure</0>, or <0>secure your digital assets</0>, <1>Think Ahead</1> is here to help you every step of the way. Experience collaboration that leads to <0>real results</0> and promotes your <0>sustainable growth</0>.

solutions.subtitle: We have a wide range of skills and experience to help you with your infrastruture needs

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.description: Security and compliance are no secondary concern for us: they are part of the entire development cycle. This makes meeting NIS2 and Cyber Resilience Act requirements a breeze.
security.splash: We'll ensure your assets are safe, whatever the environment
security.subtitle: Security is core to how we work. We can help you meet regulations or simply build with peace of mind.

training.title: Training & Workshops
training.description: Promote the growth of your employees with our interactive training and workshops on cloud, security and modern software development.

cloud.splash: We'll make your cloud portfolio reliable and cost-effective
cloud.subtitle: Whether you are thinking of moving to the cloud, or want to optimise your existing resources, our expertise will make a difference.

benefits.title: Why use the Cloud?
benefits.subtitle: A Cloud-native approach to your infrastructure can have numerous powerful advantages over an on-premises or single-server approach.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: Your infrastructure can grow to a size that matches your demand, even during peak times - and then scale down automatically when such intense workloads aren't necessary.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: When your business changes, your infrastructure can too. When you grow to a new scale, or spin up a whole new business unit, you can meet demand with no need to overthink.

cost.title: Cost control
cost.description: Detailed billing allows you to track what you're using and pay for that alone, while making it possible to plan for further cost reductions using real-time data.

security.title: Security control
security.description: In an on-premises environment, it's very hard to stop an attacker once they've gained access to your resources. But with network micro-segmentation and granular policies, you can tailor, limit and track every access.

availability.title: Availability is managed
availability.description: In a datacentre, you must deal with any problem yourself: this is labour-intensive, slow and costly. Cloud-native solutions can redeploy automatically with minimal cost and downtime - and often without any manual user intervention.

maintenance.title: Maintenance is managed
maintenance.description: Tools like Kubernetes can take huge effort to upgrade, and even modifying individual servers and databases can be risky. Cloud tools can allow for seamless upgrades through rolling deployments or serverless approaches.

challenges.title: Challenges of the Cloud
challenges.subtitle: Cloud computing can solve many problems, but nothing is perfect. There are a number of common difficulties and uncertainties we've seen regularly across companies.

uncertainty.title: Unsure where to start
uncertainty.description: It's one thing to be convinced of the benefits of the cloud, quite another to set up your first real system.

cost.title: Cost growth
cost.description: The Cloud offers cost control, but also many expensive features. These can grow rapidly if not paid attention to.

combination.title: Combining tools
combination.description: Your cloud systems must work with third-party resources and any locally-hosted tools. You may even wish to connect multiple cloud providers.

ux.title: Clunky user experience
ux.description: Your users — developers or customers — may be confused if too many tools are introduced together.

keeping-track.title: Keeping track
keeping-track.description: When it's easy to set up new resources, without clear structures it's also easy to forget what you have and what it's for.

security.title: Security and Compliance
security.description: Security is its own, critically important field.
security.link: Read more on our dedicated page

solutions.title: Our Cloud solutions
solutions.subtitle: Whatever your level of Cloud familiarity, we help you gain the benefits of the cloud while avoiding the pitfalls.

migration.title: Cloud migration
migration.description: So you have an on-premises or single-server system, and want to gain the full benefits of the cloud? We build a system that works for you, and make sure you have the information you need to use it effectively.

architecture.title: Cloud solution architecture
architecture.description: When designing a new system for your employees or clients, it's critical to build with the right goals in mind. We help you determine those goals, and meet them effectively.

cost.title: Cloud cost savings
cost.description: The complexity of the cloud makes it easy to pay for more than you need. We help you keep your costs under control and make savings where they make sense.

devops.title: DevOps engineering
devops.description: As your codebase grows, it becomes ever more critical and difficult that your software is deployed and runs without issues. We help you monitor your applications and infrastructure and keep them running optimally.

platform.title: Platform Engineering
platform.description: Whether you're on a public or a private cloud, we can help with the design, development and operation of your infrastructure
platform.splash: We'll design and build your ideal cloud platform
platform.subtitle: Our experience across many clouds and industries makes us an ideal partner for perfecting your infrastructure.

essential.title: Platform engineering is essential for your business
essential.subtitle: Well-built and tailored infrastructure can provide you with a wide range of benefits.

goals.title: Achieving business goals
goals.description: Platform engineering aligns technology with business goals, ensuring every investment and process improvement directly supports your strategic objectives.

adaptation.title: Response to market changes
adaptation.description: In today’s dynamic market, the ability to adapt quickly is crucial. Platform engineering equips your business with technology frameworks that can easily integrate new tools and adapt to changing market demands, keeping you ahead of the competition.

complexity.title: Reduced IT complexity
complexity.description: Our platforms reduce complexity and friction by unifying tools and processes across projects and teams. This cuts costs while also decreasing the time needed to onboard new developers, allowing them to contribute faster and more effectively.

predictability.title: Predictable outcomes
predictability.description: Standardisation reduces variables that lead to project delays and budget overruns. You can then set realistic expectations to consistently meet project timelines and budgets, providing a predictable environment for business planning and financial forecasting.

security.title: Security and compliance
security.description: Data security and regulatory compliance are always growing in importance. Platform engineering ensures your infrastructure is built with these in mind from the ground up. This proactively mitigates risks and protects your assets from emerging threats.

sustainability.title: Sustainability and scalability
sustainability.description: We design platforms that are built to last, even through long-term growth and adaptation. Help your IT infrastructure expand seamlessly as your business grows: no constant redesigning and rebuilding.

solutions.title: Our platform engineering solutions
solutions.subtitle: Every platform is unique. We will help you to navigate the complex cloud-native landscape and build infrastructure that fits your needs.

assessment.title: Platform Assessment and Strategy
assessment.description: Evaluate your current IT landscape: develop a strategic platform vision to align with business and user needs. Make a thorough analysis of existing infrastructure, identify gaps, then create a clear, actionable roadmap. We ensure that your platform strategy is cohesive, forward-thinking, and tailored to drive business success efficiently and effectively.

developers.title: Internal Developer Platform
developers.description: Enable developer self-service and build golden paths so that developers can get things done. Reduce their cognitive load without abstracting away context and underlying technologies. We follow best practices by treating platforms as a product, building and continually improving based on user research.

hybrid.title: Hybrid Cloud / Multi Cloud
hybrid.description: For most enterprises hybrid cloud is inevitable, so planning is critical to make the best use of it. Split workloads across different clouds or on-premises environments in an efficient and meaningful way, while maintaining consistent security and compliance in all environments.

ai.title: AI & IoT Platform
ai.description: Leverage the predictive power of AI and the sensor networks of the IoT. Boost reliability and sustainability by building a unified platform for real-time data analytics and actionable insights. Enhance operational efficiency, personalise experiences, and proactively manage maintenance.

training.splash: We'll make your team's best even better
training.subtitle: Our enthusiastic team shares our deep knowledge of best practices and current technologies in a range of interactive workshops and seminars.
training.courses-subtitle: Sign up now to one of our practical, expert-led courses.
training.coming-soon: More courses will be released in the near future. Watch this space!

signup.title: Sign up now
signup.subtitle: Ready to take your skills to the next level? Enter your details to request your spot in our next session.
signup.next-steps: Our team will be in touch soon with more information and course dates.

kubernetes.title: Practical Kubernetes
kubernetes.description: The perfect training, to utilize Kubernetes in production in a simple, efficient and secure way.
kubernetes.subtitle: Whether you are new to container orchestration or looking to formalize your skills, this course offers a comprehensive introduction and deep dive into Kubernetes' core functionalities.

basics.title: Foundational Kubernetes Knowledge
basics.description: Understand the history and architecture of Kubernetes.

skills.title: Practical Kubernetes Skills
skills.description: Set up environments, deploy applications, scale and monitor their performance efficiently.

advanced.title: Advanced Kubernetes Techniques
advanced.description: Secure your Kubernetes environments and applications, reduce costs, and take into account the carbon footprint of your deployments.

about.format: This course will be delivered online via seminars, real-time discussions and hands-on labs, spread over three days.
about.instructors: Learn from the best. Our instructors are seasoned Kubernetes practitioners, leveraging their extensive experience in consultancy to provide you with real-world insights and practical knowledge.
about.benefits: Prepare to harness the full potential of Kubernetes for developing and managing modern cloud-native applications, significantly boosting your professional capabilities and career prospects.
about.schedule: Scheduled sessions take place from Tuesday to Thursday in the last week of each month. For the coming months, these will fall on:

security.title: Cloud Security & Compliance
security.description: Egal ob public oder private Cloud. Wir unterstützen bei Entwurf, Entwicklung und Betrieb Ihrer Cloud Umgebung.
security.splash: Wir entwerfen und implementieren die ideale Cloud Plattform für Sie
security.subtitle: Vertrauen Sie unsere langjährige Erfahrung mit Cloud Computing über alle Industrien hinweg.

stats.title: Your company has never faced more cyber risks

damage.description: Average damage caused by cyber attacks

human.description: of attacks were initiated by human error

remediation.description: Average time to identify and remediate an attack

problem.description: had a data breach / failed a cloud audit

protect.title: Protect your business
protect.subtitle: Discover how we secure your business and data.

agile.title: Agile methodologies for secure software architecture and development
agile.description: Embrace Agile methodologies to enhance the security of your software architecture and development processes, integrating agile threat modeling to identify and mitigate risks early. Our approach emphasizes continuous security testing and DevSecOps practices, ensuring security is a foundational component throughout the software creation and deployment stages.

zerotrust.title: Zero Trust Identity & Access Management
zerotrust.description: Implement Zero Trust Identity & Access Management to safeguard against leaked credentials and passwords, ensuring all user identities are verifiable before granting secure cloud access. Our robust framework prevents unauthorized access by requiring continuous validation of every access request, securing your data and systems from potential threats.

supplychain.title: Secure Software Supplychain
supplychain.description: Strengthen your software supply chain with our security measures compliant with the Cyber Resilience Act. We implement a detailed Software Bill of Materials (SBOM), secure CI/CD practices, and build provenance verification to guard against vulnerabilities and ensure robust cyber resilience throughout the development lifecycle.

cloud.title: Cloud Security
cloud.description: Enhance your cloud security by implementing robust guardrails and continuous monitoring across all cloud environments to prevent misconfiguration and ensure data integrity. Our proactive approach minimizes risks and optimizes cloud operations, keeping your digital assets safe and compliant.

consult.title: Consulting
consult.description: Tap into our expert consulting services to navigate the complexities of IT infrastructure and strategy. We provide personalized guidance to optimize your technology investments, helping you align IT solutions with business objectives and drive growth.

implement.title: Implementation
implement.description: Leverage our hands-on implementation services to deploy cutting-edge technology solutions effectively. Our team ensures seamless integration of new systems into your existing infrastructure, minimizing disruption and maximizing performance.

train.title: Training
train.description: Empower your team with our comprehensive training programs designed to enhance skills and proficiency in new technologies and processes. We offer tailored training sessions that enable your staff to manage and maintain your IT systems efficiently, ensuring long-term success.
